title: Hour 2 -Scott Miller (05-25-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 -Scott Miller (05-25-20)
description:
With Dan & the Dannettes off, Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb fill in. They talk about the NFL’s plans to start the season with fans in attendance. MLB columnist Scott Miller joins the show to discuss return of baseball and what obstacles still need to be overcome. They also debate Reggie Bush’s comments about paying college athletes and the potential issues that can occur.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
